Question: In 1488, this person appealed to the court of Portugal once again, and once again, John II invited him to an audience.
Hints: Thus also ended this person' Third voyage to the Indies.
With an eastern sea route to Asia apparently at hand, King John was no longer interested in this person's far-fetched project.
In 1795, when France took over the entire island of Hispaniola, this person's remains were moved to Havana, Cuba.
